What a great opportunity to shamelessly toot my family's horn(s)! My brother, Allan Katz, has a very noteworthy career in show business. Among his many credits, Allan was Executive Producer of M*A*S*H*, Rhoda, Roseanne and wrote and starred in the film "Big Man on Campus." He also wrote the book for the award winning musical "Song of Singapore." My sister, Phyllis Katz, is a highly respected actress/singer (member/teacher at the Groundlings in Los Angeles, co-star of Sherman Oaks series on Showtime) and songwriter. My daughter, Lauren Katz, is a well-respected actress and member of the now-defunct but heavily cult-followed improvisational trio known as Slotnick, Katz & Lehr. My son, Steve Katz, is a real estate partner in a Minneapolis law firm as well as an adjunct professor of law at University of Minnesota law school and a first-rate jazz bassist who has performed at the better local Minneapolis clubs (Artist's Quarter and Dakota). Stu Katz
